00023 ecorecpp::MetaModelRepository_ptr ConfigurationUtils::getPreloadedMMR()
00024 {
00025     ecorecpp::MetaModelRepository_ptr mmr = ecorecpp::MetaModelRepository::_instance();
00026     mmr->load(Network_Configuration::Network_ConfigurationPackage::_instance());
00027     mmr->load(System_Specification::System_SpecificationPackage::_instance());
00028     mmr->load(Device_Target_Mapping::Device_Target_MappingPackage::_instance());
00029     mmr->load(Device_Specification::Device_SpecificationPackage::_instance());
00030     mmr->load(Device_Targets::Device_TargetsPackage::_instance());
00031     mmr->load(Protocol_Definition::Protocol_DefinitionPackage::_instance());
00032     mmr->load(IP_Configuration::IP_ConfigurationPackage::_instance());
00033     mmr->load(Virtuallink_Map::Virtuallink_MapPackage::_instance());
00034     return mmr;
00035 }

00047 long ConfigurationUtils::mac2long(std::string string)
00048 {
00049     std::string::size_type pos;
00050     while ((pos = string.find(":")) != std::string::npos)
00051         string.erase(pos, 1);
00052     return strtoul(string.c_str(), NULL, 16);
00053 }
00054 
00055 // Vorsicht: mac_len ist immer 6,  string_len ist 4 (f체r ct_marker) oder 6
00056 // TODO: L채ngen 체berpr체fen
00057 void ConfigurationUtils::mac2Bytes(std::string string, uint8_t string_len, uint8_t mac[], uint8_t mac_len)
00058 {
00059     std::string::size_type pos;
00060 
00061     while ((pos = string.find(":")) != std::string::npos)
00062     {
00063         string.erase(pos, 1);
00064     }
00065 
00066     memset(mac, 0, mac_len);
00067     unsigned long macInt = strtoul(string.c_str(), NULL, 16);
00068     for (int i = 0; i < string_len; i++)
00069     {
00070         mac[string_len - (i + 1)] = (uint8_t) macInt;
00071         macInt = macInt >> 8;
00072     }
00073 }
00074 
00075 unsigned long ConfigurationUtils::time2ticks(std::string string, double tick)
00076 {
00077     double factor = 0;
00078     std::string::size_type pos;
00079     if ((pos = string.find("ns")) != std::string::npos)
00080     {
00081         factor = 1000000000;
00082     }
00083     else if ((pos = string.find("us")) != std::string::npos)
00084     {
00085         factor = 1000000;
00086     }
00087     else if ((pos = string.find("ms")) != std::string::npos)
00088     {
00089         factor = 1000;
00090     }
00091     else if ((pos = string.find("s")) != std::string::npos)
00092         factor = 1;
00093 
00094     if (pos != std::string::npos)
00095         string.erase(pos);
00096     return round(::strtod(string.c_str(), 0) / (tick * factor));
00097 }
00098 
00099 double ConfigurationUtils::freq2s(std::string string)
00100 {
00101     double factor = 0;
00102     std::string::size_type pos;
00103     if ((pos = string.find("MHZ")) != std::string::npos || (pos = string.find("MHz")) != std::string::npos || (pos
00104             = string.find("Mhz")) != std::string::npos)
00105     {
00106         factor = 1000000;
00107     }
00108     if (pos != std::string::npos)
00109         string.erase(pos);
00110     return 1 / (::strtod(string.c_str(), 0) * factor);
00111 }

00113 Device_Specification::DeviceSpecification_ptr ConfigurationUtils::getDeviceSpecification(std::string device_name,
00114         Network_Configuration::NetworkConfig_ptr nc)
00115 {
00116     ecorecpp::mapping::EList<Network_Configuration::DeviceReferringElement>& dreList = nc->getDeviceReferringElement();
00117     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < dreList.size(); i++)
00118     {
00119         Network_Configuration::DeviceReferringElement_ptr dre = dreList.get(i);
00120         if (!dre->getRefDevice()->getName().compare(device_name))
00121         {
00122             return dre->getRefDeviceSpecification();
00123         }
00124     }
00125     return 0;
00126 }

00128 int ConfigurationUtils::getPortSerialNumber(System_Specification::Port_ptr port,
00129         Device_Target_Mapping::Mappings_ptr map)
00130 {
00131     ecorecpp::mapping::EList<Device_Target_Mapping::DeviceMapping>& devicemapList =
00132             map->getDeviceMappings()->getDeviceMapping();
00133     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < devicemapList.size(); i++)
00134     {
00135         Device_Target_Mapping::PortMappings_ptr pms = devicemapList.get(i)->getPortMappings();
00136         // Switch Portmappings
00137         if (!pms->eClass()->getName().compare("SwPortMappings"))
00138         {
00139             ecorecpp::mapping::EList<Device_Target_Mapping::SwPortMapping>& portmapList = pms->as<
00140                     Device_Target_Mapping::SwPortMappings> ()->getTargetPortMapping();
00141             //Go through port mappings
00142             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < portmapList.size(); j++)
00143             {
00144                 Device_Target_Mapping::SwPortMapping_ptr pm = portmapList.get(j);
00145                 std::string refname = pm->getRefPort()->getName();
00146                 std::string pname = port->getName();
00147                 //If reference device is our device and PHY is found we have a physical port
00148                 if (!pm->getRefPort()->getName().compare(port->getName()) && !pm->getRefTargetPort()->getName().find(
00149                         "PHY") != -1)
00150                 {
00151                     return pm->getRefTargetPort()->getPortSerialNumber();
00152                 }
00153             }
00154         }
00155         // EndSystem Portmappings
00156         else if (!pms->eClass()->getName().compare("EsPortMappings"))
00157         {
00158             ecorecpp::mapping::EList<Device_Target_Mapping::EsPortMapping>& portmapList = pms->as<
00159                     Device_Target_Mapping::EsPortMappings> ()->getTargetPortMapping();
00160             //Go through port mappings
00161             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < portmapList.size(); j++)
00162             {
00163                 Device_Target_Mapping::EsPortMapping_ptr pm = portmapList.get(j);
00164                 //If reference device is our device and PHY is found we have a physical port
00165                 if (!pm->getRefPort()->getName().compare(port->getName()) && !pm->getRefTargetPort()->getName().find(
00166                         "PHY") != -1)
00167                 {
00168                     return pm->getRefTargetPort()->getPortSerialNumber();
00169                 }
00170             }
00171         }
00172     }
00173     return -1;
00174 }

00176 string ConfigurationUtils::getPortName(System_Specification::Port_ptr port, Device_Target_Mapping::Mappings_ptr map)
00177 {
00178     ecorecpp::mapping::EList<Device_Target_Mapping::DeviceMapping>& devicemapList =
00179             map->getDeviceMappings()->getDeviceMapping();
00180     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < devicemapList.size(); i++)
00181     {
00182         Device_Target_Mapping::PortMappings_ptr pms = devicemapList.get(i)->getPortMappings();
00183         // Switch Portmappings
00184         if (!pms->eClass()->getName().compare("SwPortMappings"))
00185         {
00186             ecorecpp::mapping::EList<Device_Target_Mapping::SwPortMapping>& portmapList = pms->as<
00187                     Device_Target_Mapping::SwPortMappings> ()->getTargetPortMapping();
00188             //Go through port mappings
00189             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < portmapList.size(); j++)
00190             {
00191                 Device_Target_Mapping::SwPortMapping_ptr pm = portmapList.get(j);
00192                 std::string refname = pm->getRefPort()->getName();
00193                 //If reference device is our device
00194                 if (!pm->getRefPort()->getName().compare(port->getName()))
00195                 {
00196                     return pm->getRefTargetPort()->getName();
00197                 }
00198             }
00199         }
00200         // EndSystem Portmappings
00201         else if (!pms->eClass()->getName().compare("EsPortMappings"))
00202         {
00203             ecorecpp::mapping::EList<Device_Target_Mapping::EsPortMapping>& portmapList = pms->as<
00204                     Device_Target_Mapping::EsPortMappings> ()->getTargetPortMapping();
00205             //Go through port mappings
00206             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < portmapList.size(); j++)
00207             {
00208                 Device_Target_Mapping::EsPortMapping_ptr pm = portmapList.get(j);
00209                 //If reference device is our device and PHY is found we have a physical port
00210                 if (!pm->getRefPort()->getName().compare(port->getName()))
00211                 {
00212                     return pm->getRefTargetPort()->getName();
00213                 }
00214             }
00215         }
00216     }
00217     return NULL;
00218 }

00220 int ConfigurationUtils::getVLid(System_Specification::VirtualLink_ptr vl, Device_Target_Mapping::Mappings_ptr map)
00221 {
00222     Virtuallink_Map::VirtualLinkMapping_ptr vlming = map->getRefVirtualLinkMappings();
00223     ecorecpp::mapping::EList<Virtuallink_Map::VirtualLinkMap>& vlmList = vlming->getVirtualLinkMap();
00224     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < vlmList.size(); j++)
00225     {
00226         Virtuallink_Map::VirtualLinkMap_ptr vlm = vlmList.get(j);
00227         if (!vlm->getRefVirtualLink()->getVlid().compare(vl->getVlid()))
00228         {
00229             return vlm->getId();
00230         }
00231     }
00232     return -1;
00233 }
00234 
00235 System_Specification::VirtualLink_ptr ConfigurationUtils::getVLfromVLid(int vlid,
00236         Device_Target_Mapping::Mappings_ptr map)
00237 {
00238     Virtuallink_Map::VirtualLinkMapping_ptr vlming = map->getRefVirtualLinkMappings();
00239     ecorecpp::mapping::EList<Virtuallink_Map::VirtualLinkMap>& vlmList = vlming->getVirtualLinkMap();
00240     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < vlmList.size(); j++)
00241     {
00242         Virtuallink_Map::VirtualLinkMap_ptr vlm = vlmList.get(j);
00243         if (vlm->getId() == vlid)
00244         {
00245             return vlm->getRefVirtualLink();
00246         }
00247     }
00248     //NOT FOUND
00249     return 0;
00250 }
